```{r}

library(webexercises)
```

```{r}
#| class: webex-box
#| echo: false
#| results: asis 
question <- "Which type of plot is best suited for visualising the distribution of a single continuous variable?"
question_choices <- c(
    "Scatter plot",
    "Bar chart",
    "Pie chart",
    answer = "Boxplot")
cat(question, longmcq(sample(question_choices)))
```
